home.parrafo-info: Self-taught programmer focused on web, software and video game development. Passionate about creating functional, dynamic and visually appealing solutions. I am dedicated to continuously learn and apply my knowledge in projects that offer unique and intuitive experiences for users. Currently, I am working on my own projects while expanding my technical and creative skills.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a passionate software, web and video game developer, focused on constantly learning and overcoming challenges. I aspire to work in a company where I can gain professional experience, enhance my skills and develop my own projects in the future.

I am a proactive, adaptable and creative person, with skills for teamwork, problem solving under pressure and fast learning. Programming motivates me because of its difficulty and the satisfaction I feel when completing a project. I strive to maintain a responsible, empathetic and committed attitude, always guided by the values of loyalty and honesty.

I also count as Property of Ana Duran.

formacion.title: Training
formacion.formacion3: Accounting for Commercial and Financial Transactions

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A game where the user must guess the secret word with a certain number of chances. The word is chosen randomly by the program and the user will lose the moment the gallows is completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can type a text and the encryptor encrypts it with pre-programmed keys. The encryptor can also decrypt the text.
